p: Dosage: the optimal dose and schedule of tocilizumab is not clearly defined [ 36]. In a few studies, a one-time dose of IV tocilizumab 400 mg showed promising results [ 39]. However, one of the studies mentioned that a few patients required another dose within 12 hours [ 39]. This was in addition to other standard therapies including LPV, methylprednisolone, and oxygen therapy.
